title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: The update of the checked state of the table should be faster, taking significantly less time (e.g. a few seconds). Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the process is in progress.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the table with checkboxes.
3. Observe the time it takes to update the checked state of the table.
4. Verify if a busy cursor is displayed during the update process.
